titles.title: 352 Lord If It Be Thou (easy tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be strong beloved
When the storm shall rage
Look not like Peter
At the angry crest
Of yon great billow
Foaming seething surge
Can only drive thee
To thy Saviors breast

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
See how serene
And calm how undismayed
Thy Lord doth stand
Smiling upon thy fear
Wondering that thou
Dost dare to be afraid
When He the Lord of glory
Is so near

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou at His "Come"
Thy little boat hast left
See it is tossing
Now beyond thy call
Look not behind thee
Look into His face
Whose "Come" once uttered
Now is past recall

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Strong be thy heart
And calm and glad and brave
For angels wonder
At thy fearless faith
And Christ is glad and
Men are whispering
Their thanks to God
"Be faithful, yea to death"
